message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $100. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. Would you be open to selling it for $85?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $85 is just a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further. How about $95? It's still a good deal for you, and it gives me a bit more than my minimum.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product. This price aligns better with my budget while still allowing you to receive a fair return.
